event.title: a deal was possible during an initial hearing Thursday

data.event: Robert Schembs, one of four lawyers on Fairfield’s defense team, told Superior Court II Judge Rebecca McClure a deal was possible during an initial hearing Thursday.
Specifics will follow Thursday’s hearing, he told McClure.

event.title: were filed against Fairfield on March 16

data.event: Additional charges of reckless homicide, neglect of a dependent and lying to police were filed against Fairfield on March 16.
McClure gave attorneys until 11 a.m. April 24, when an hearing to review evidence is scheduled, to approve a plea agreement.
On Jan. 20, Prosecutor Todd Meyer offered to have her confess to reckless homicide.
